snippet: The United Nations human rights chief said a new article to the interim constitution made the junta’s move to lift martial law “meaningless.”
abstract: United Nations human rights chief Zeid Ra'ad al-Hussein blasts Thai junta over martial law replacement.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations human rights chief said a new article to the interim constitution made the junta’s move to lift martial law “meaningless.”

headline.main: U.N. Rights Chief Criticizes ‘Draconian’ Powers Given to Thai Military
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | United Nations; Human Rights Chief Faults Thai Junta

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
